description: This table contains the appointment serial number for a recommendation audit trail entry.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the recommendation record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated workflow in this recommendation record. Together with FINDING_ID, this forms the foreign key to the REC_LINK_AUDIT_TRL.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple audit trail appointment serial numbers that are associated with the recommendation and the workflow from the REC_LINK_AUDIT_TRL table.

columns.name: AUD_APPT_SERIAL_NO
columns.description: The appointment serial number for the recommendation audit trail entry.
